revision.text:
==EV Yield Setup== [[Pokerus|EV Yield]] is affected by the [[Rowap]] berry. The below setup increases the yield of EVs gained in all applicable situations. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ '''''Maximum EV Gain Bonus: 2.54x''''' |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 20%;" | [[File:Rowap.png|30px]]
